class_e_02_battle_01:
Outro dia, outra rodada de estudo de batalha! Osu!
Vamos direto ao ponto!![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_02: Todos estão animados com a caçada do Tesouro?![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_03:
É sempre uma ótima aventura! Podem conquistar
Ginásios, ir para novos lugares e correr por todo o\r
lugar com o seu parceiro Pokémon![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_04:
E, enquanto corre por aí, aposto que encontrará
grandes [clr:6]cristais [clr:0], brilhando com\r
bastante frequência também..[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_05:
Esses cristais são, na verdade, energia terastal
acumulada que vazaram do solo![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_06:
You can check out these crystals to battle Tera
Pokémon with your friends or other Trainers in a\r
group of four.[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_07: We call those battles...Tera Raid Battles![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_08:
The Tera Pokémon you’ll face off against in Tera
Raid Battles are crazy tough![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_09:
They sometimes act differently than regular
Pokémon, so you’ll need to be on your guard![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_10:
Luckily, Trainers can also use a special action in
Tera Raid Battles. It’s called [clr:6]cheering[clr:0]![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_11: And there are three different cheers you can use![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_12:
The first cheer is “[clr:6]Go all out![clr:0]” It boosts the
Attack and Sp. Atk of all ally Pokémon.[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_13:
The second is “[clr:6]Hang tough![clr:0]” This one boosts
the Defense and Sp. Def of all ally Pokémon.[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_14: And the third— Well, let’s see if you can guess![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_15:
This cheer restores HP for all ally Pokémon.
What do you think it is?[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_answer_01:
That’s right! Maybe I should make YOU the battle
teacher, huh, new kid?![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_answer_02:
Wham-Bam Potion?! That sounds less like a cheer
and more like a seriously heavy-handed medical\r
treatment or something![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_answer_03:
Explosive healing wave?! That’s a wild answer if
I ever heard one! But I think I’d like to give that\r
move a whirl if it really existed![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_16:
The third and final cheer is “[clr:6]Heal up![clr:0]” It’s a real
powerhouse, with the ability to both restore HP\r
and cure status conditions![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_17:
You can cheer up to three times during a single
Tera Raid Battle.[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_18:
Also, cheering uses up a turn in battle, so you
won’t be able to have your Pokémon use any of\r
their moves when you cheer![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_20:
Try everything at your disposal! If nothing seems
to be working, try cheering on your allies![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_21:
Providing support for your team can sometimes
open up a new realm of possibilities![npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_22:
Aw, man! I was just about to suggest we do some
hands-on practice to really drive the point home,\r
but I guess we’re out of time...[npcn:24]
class_e_02_battle_23: Class is over for now! Take care, you little rascals![npcn:24]
